question: 8. What happens if I cancel the subscription within contract period?
answer:
▪ If you cancel the subscription within the contract period of the packages, you will 
be charged with the standard early termination fee, which is the full subscription 
fees of the remaining months in the contract period.

question: 9. Can I transfer my Unifi account to another owner?

ended.  
▪ Please note that all OTT entitlements are not transferable to the new owner or 
account.
